thread.title: The Season's Most Beautiful Haute Couture, Shot in the Southern California Desert - WSJ.com

author: Photography Dario Catellani
title: The Season's Most Beautiful Haute Couture, Shot in the Southern California Desert - WSJ.com
text: The Season's Most Beautiful Haute Couture, Shot in the Southern California Desert The latest couture offerings spring forth with breathtaking blooms of tulle, satin, embellished silk and feathers. Photography by Dario Catellani; Styling by George Cortina Scroll FROCK & ROLL Clear a path for a dramatic pink gown. Giambattista Valli Haute Couture dress, price and availability upon request, +33-01-40-17-05-88. Photography by Dario Catellani; Styling by George Cortina RARE BIRDS Weightless volume allows for lyrical movement. Azzaro Couture coat, price and availability upon request, Bergdorf Goodman, 754 Fifth Avenue, New York. Photography by Dario Catellani; Styling by George Cortina Givenchy Haute Couture dress, price and availability upon request, givenchy​.com. Photography by Dario Catellani; Styling by George Cortina ESCAPE FANTASY Feathered hats and billowing layers make for fantastical elegance. Valentino Haute Couture cape, pants and gloves and Philip Treacy for Valentino Haute Couture hat, prices and availability upon request, Valentino, 821 Madison Avenue, New York, 212-772-6969, Aquazzura sandals, $875, aquazzura​.com. Photography by Dario Catellani; Styling by George Cortina Giambattista Valli Haute Couture dress, price and availability upon request, +33-01-40-17-05-88. Photography by Dario Catellani; Styling by George Cortina UP AND AWAY Find freedom in a dress that’s as light as air. Chanel Haute Couture dress, price and availability upon request, 800-550-0005, Ann Demeulemeester sandals, $855, anndemeulemeester​.com, Haptic Lab kite, $42, hapticlab​.com. Photography by Dario Catellani; Styling by George Cortina FROZEN IN TIME Delicate details reveal the handiwork of couturiers. Dior Haute Couture dress, price and availability upon request, 800-929-3467. Photography by Dario Catellani; Styling by George Cortina Armani Privé dress, price and availability upon request, Giorgio Armani, 717 Fifth Avenue, New York. Photography by Dario Catellani; Styling by George Cortina TRAILBLAZER Try on organic pieces that encourage movement. Iris van Herpen Couture dress, price and availability upon request, irisvanherpen​.com. Photography by Dario Catellani; Styling by George Cortina Valentino Haute Couture cape, top and pants, prices and availability upon request, Valentino, 821 Madison Avenue, New York, 212-772-6969, Ann Demeulemeester sandals, $855, anndemeulemeester​.com. Model, Shanelle Nyasiase at Red Model Management; hair, Marki Shkreli; makeup, Dick Page; manicure, Marisa Carmichael. Photography by Dario Catellani; Styling by George Cortina Advertisement
